---
config:
  layout: fixed
---
flowchart TD
    A(("Start")) --> B["Boil Water"]
    B --> C{"Do you have coffee grounds?"}
    C -- No --> D["Buy Coffee Grounds"]
    C -- Yes --> E["Add Coffee Grounds to Filter"]
    D --> E
    E --> F["Pour Boiling Water Over Grounds"]
    F --> G["Let it Brew"]
    G --> H{"Is the coffee strong enough?"}
    H -- No --> I["Let it Brew Longer"]
    H L_H_J_0@-- Yes --> J["Pour into Cup"]
    I --> H
    J L_J_K_0@--> K(("Enjoy Your Coffee!"))
    L_H_J_0@{ animation: slow } 
    L_J_K_0@{ animation: fast }

%% Use Case Diagram
flowchart TB
    subgraph "Autonomous Research Mapping System"
        direction TB
        %% Define actor shapes
        Researcher[/fa:fa-user Researcher/]
        Administrator[/fa:fa-user Administrator/]
        %% Define use cases
        UC1["Collect Academic Metadata"]
        UC2["Process Data"]
        UC3["Cluster Research Topics"]
        UC4["Visualize Clusters"]
        UC5["Evaluate Accuracy"]
        UC6["Update Data Sources"]
        UC7["Manage System Settings"]
        %% Define relationships
        Researcher --> UC1
        Researcher --> UC2
        Researcher --> UC3
        Researcher --> UC4
        Researcher --> UC5
        Administrator --> UC6
        Administrator --> UC7
    end
